data.title: Car rental in Thessaloniki Greece from Ellin Car
data.meta_description: Аренда авто в Салониках Греция с компанией Ellincar. Полная страховка, отличное соотношение цен и предлагаемых автомобилей. Без залогов и переплат.
data.text:
Thessaloniki car rental

The freedom to move around is the key to a successful trip across Greece. This country has so many historical landmarks and beaches that the decision to hire a car in Thessaloniki will become a perfect choice for forthcoming adventures. Thessaloniki car hire service allows you to feel such freedom to the fullest extent.

Advantages of car hire Thessaloniki

There are a lot of reasons to hire a vehicle at the car rental office upon arrival to Thessaloniki:

Thessaloniki features a convenient geographical location. A private vehicle provides a traveler with the possibility to reach the legendary Meteora Monasteries, ancient Vergina, magnificent Olympus, and the most popular beaches of the Halkidiki Peninsula;

You no longer need to be tied to the schedule of local buses;

You will get an opportunity to combine various types of activities (for example, a cognitive activity with recreation on the beach or pilgrimage) and see a range of exciting things and places, which are absent in a tour with a guide;

A private vehicle provides an excellent opportunity to visit attractions before the peak attendance and keeps a traveler safe from waiting in a line and crowds of visitors;

Greece will get closer to you: it will make you feel as if you were one of its residents and offer the possibility to enjoy transportation without limits.

To cut a long story short, a rental car in Thessaloniki from Ellin Car is a great option that helps a traveler to turn his holidays in Greece into a memorable experience full of happiness and joy. A perfect combination of high service level and reasonable rates turns out a pleasant bonus for even the most demanding clients.

Why travel with Ellin Car?

Our car fleet predominantly consists of new vehicles, the state of which is always excellent.

You get twenty-four-hour support that will help you to deal with any questions and situations.

We provide our clients with unlimited kilometrage.

We take no hidden charges: the relations between the company and clients are fair and confidential.

A wide choice of additional services – we do our best to provide your traveling experience with the maximum of comfort.

Our vehicle fleet and price policy

Our car fleet comprises various vehicle classes for hire in Thessaloniki:

Volkswagen Polo with an automatic gearbox;

Peugeot 301 with a manual gearbox;

Citroen C-elysee with an automatic gearbox;

Toyota Yaris with a manual gearbox.

To view the full list of transport, please, visit Ellin Car.

How to rent a car in Thessaloniki

Choose the date, the pick-time and the due date in the window on the home page. Besides, you can choose the airport as a delivery point and start a self-guided tour right after leaving the terminal building.

Pay attention: the minimum period of booking is 3 days.

After you pick up the date and time, you will see a list of available transport. This page provides all the necessary information per each variant and the possibility to choose the most appropriate option, based on the cost and technical parameters. Moreover, you can select additional services, for example, a car seat. While finalizing your order, do not forget to pay attention to the number of passenger seats. After that, you will be asked to enter your phone number, e-mail, and name to end reservation.

Car booking terms & conditions

The minimum age of a driver is 23 years.

The Lessee who comes from a non-EC country should have an international driver’s license, issued at least 1 year ago.

The Lessee is required to pay for car hire upon the delivery of the vehicle.

The Lessee bears full responsibility for road traffic violations and pays the fines.

It is prohibited to let other people drive a rental car (the only exception is the second driver, stipulated in the contract), to leave the borders of Greece or transfer a vehicle via a ferry without written permission for that.

Be sure to read the full rental terms, given in the “Terms & Conditions” section on the website of Ellin Car
